lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic, faltering and looking unusually vulnerable in his opening match at the U.S. Open, will attempt to right the ship on Wednesday when he plays Czech Jiri Vesely in the second round.
snippet: Novak Djokovic, faltering and looking unusually vulnerable in his opening match at the U.S. Open, will attempt to right the ship on Wednesday when he plays Czech Jiri Vesely in the second round....

headline.main: Vulnerable Djokovic Looks to Right Ship Against Vesely
headline.print_headline: Vulnerable Djokovic Looks to Right Ship Against Vesely
